context_bundle.summary: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation): Retrieve relevant docs, feed to LLM. Advantages: cost-effective (only relevant info), current data, citations, reduced latency. Use for: >1M tokens, current events, source attribution, cost-sensitive apps. 65% cost reduction vs full context.

onboarding.quick_start: RAG = retrieve relevant chunks + generate response. Steps: 1. Chunk documents 2. Embed chunks 3. Store in vector DB 4. Query retrieves top-K 5. LLM generates from retrieved context. Use for large knowledge bases, current info, citations. 65% cheaper than full context (Gemini).
common_patterns: Hybrid: RAG + long-context for best of both
Vector DB: Pinecone, Weaviate, Chroma, Qdrant
